## Creative Coding - Sonja Sch√§r{.unlisted}

::: center
```{ojs}
//| echo: true
//| code-fold: true
//| code-summary: "Quellcode von Sonja Sch√§r"
P5 = require("p5")

function* createSketch(sketch) {
  const element = DOM.element('div');
  yield element;
  const instance = new P5(sketch, element, true);
  try {
    while (true) {
      yield element;
    }
  } finally {
    instance.remove();
  }
}

createSketch((s) => {
    s.setup = () => {
    s.sizeX = 960;
    s.sizeY = 400;
    s.createCanvas(s.sizeX, s.sizeY);
    s.background(0);
  };

  s.draw = () => {
    meinKreisePinsel();
  };

  function meinKreisePinsel() {
    s.strokeWeight(1);
    s.fill(255 / s.sizeX * s.mouseX, 0, 255 / s.sizeY * (s.sizeY - s.mouseX));
    s.circle(s.mouseX, s.mouseY, s.dist(s.mouseX, s.mouseY, s.pmouseX, s.pmouseY));
  }
})

```
